function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","Impact":"High mortality rate, strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Implementation of control measures, behavior changes","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, testing and tracing technologies","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Delay in implementation of interventions","Impact":"Increased infection rates, higher mortality","Mitigation":"Timely decision making, rapid response","Technologies":"Data analysis, modeling, communication systems","People":"General population, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","Impact":"Underpreparedness, ineffective strategies","Mitigation":"Regular reassessment of assumptions, flexible response strategies","Technologies":"Data analysis, predictive modeling","People":"Risk experts, government officials","Owner":"Risk experts, public health authorities"}]}
